events.message: Hello, I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to wrong item received.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hi, this is Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can quickly verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 7845123 and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead of what I purchased.
Thank you for sending the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid label for you to return the wrong item at no cost.
Thanks for the prompt response and the refund offer. I appreciate the prepaid label to return the item, that makes things easier.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days. The return label has also been emailed to you.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that your return shipment went smoothly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer has not reported any further issues.
